testsuite.name: StatementPrinterTests

testcase.name: exampleStatementHTML()

failure.message:
org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: < Invoice

Invoice

Client : BigCo

Piece Seats sold Price
Hamlet 55 $650.00
As You Like It 35 $580.00
Othello 40 $500.00
Total owed: $1,730.00
Fidelity points earned: 47

Payment is required under 30 days. We can break your knees if you don't do so.

> but was: < Invoice

Invoice

Client : BigCo

Piece Seats sold Price
Hamlet 55 650,00??
As You Like It 35 580,00??
Othello 40 500,00??
Total owed: $1,730.00
Fidelity points earned: 47

Payment is required under 30 days. We can break your knees if you don't do so.

>

testcase.name: promotionAppliedStatementHTML()

failure.message:
org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: < Invoice

Invoice

Client : BigCo

Piece Seats sold Price
Hamlet 55 $650.00
As You Like It 35 $580.00
Othello 40 $500.00
Total owed: $1,715.00
Fidelity points earned: 52

A promotion of $15 has been applied to your invoice due to your fidelity points.

Payment is required under 30 days. We can break your knees if you don't do so.

> but was: < Invoice

Invoice

Client : BigCo

Piece Seats sold Price
Hamlet 55 650,00??
As You Like It 35 580,00??
Othello 40 500,00??
Total owed: $1,715.00
Fidelity points earned: 52

A promotion of $15 has been applied to your invoice due to your fidelity points.

Payment is required under 30 days. We can break your knees if you don't do so.

>
